This day started like every normal winter day. After you get up from your bed you decided to eat breakfast.
You went to kitchen and prepared breakfast for your yourself. Just normal toasts with some eggs.
After this you went to salon and sit under kotatsu. When you started eating you saw something on the table.

Here please choose setting and we will continue with story :)
1.title: Intro

info.brief_description: Shrink under kotatsu and many girls will come to torture or should we say play with you.
info.description:
This is simple story for giantess fans.
This whole story will happened under kotatsu.
At first all girls will be unaware but later maybe some girls will find out about presence under kotatsu.
Many girls will come and insert their feet and other body parts to get warm up during this cold winter.

There are not many rules for this story.
Rules:
1. Main character can't leave kotatsu.
2. Main character can't die
3. No male giantess.

I was wondering whether put this in anime or real world setting. As I couldn't decide there will be two options anime and real world.
To avoid situation with to many choices such as several dozens of chapter with nothing more than anime titles. I decided to choose 3 anime: To Love-Ru, Naruto Shippuuden and Konsosuba (the last one was added in honor of kotatsu episode from this anime).

For anime setting you are main character that was shrunk under kotatsu. I won't describe more as people who will choose this anime probably already knows setting and characters.

Regarding real world setting you are young men (18) who lives with his family. Your family consist of three sisters and your mother.
In case of anime its easy to explain with magic or new lala device why we can't leave kotatsu. In case of real world let’s say that its due to heavy blanket that is normally put on kotatsu.

Jennifer (25) - Beautiful young woman with blonde hair and blue eyes. She has nice ass and big tits. At home she likes to relax so she often goes wearing only her pants and t shirt.

Anna (19) - As her older sister she is also incredibly beautiful girl with brow hair and blue eyes but she is rather a tomboy type. She likes to play sports but often is to lazy wash after game. That’s why her part will have quite strong smell. She also likes to invites many friends to her house to relax together under kotatsu. Especially after hard training or match.

Julie (17) - Pretty girl with black hair and blue eyes. She is rather nerd type. She likes to play games and read books. Especially she likes to bring her laptop to salon and sit there for hours playing games and warming her feet under kotatsu. Her feet gets really active when she starts to play :)

Sara (45) - Mature beauty. She's working on a new drug in the lab. After many hours of work, she likes to relax her tired feet’s under kotatsu.
